h2_title: Where to Find The Monk from the Sea
h3_title: Monk from the Sea Miniboss Fight and Guide
content: Defeating this Yaoguai Chief will boast an unexpected reward: Hoarfrost. With this, you'll be able to utilize a new Transformation Spell to become a Monk from the Sea, and inflict your own frost damage on enemies to chill them!
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Monk_from_the_Sea.md', within the main section titled 'Monk from the Sea', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find The Monk from the Sea' and the sub-subsection 'Monk from the Sea Miniboss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
Defeating this Yaoguai Chief will boast an unexpected reward: Hoarfrost. With this, you'll be able to utilize a new Transformation Spell to become a Monk from the Sea, and inflict your own frost damage on enemies to chill them!
